H0.text: An equilateral triangle has all 3 sides of the same length. What type of triangle only has 2 sides of equal length. Bilateral

H1.text: An equilateral triangle has all 3 sides of the same length. What type of triangle only has 2 sides of equal length. Dilateral

H2.text: An equilateral triangle has all 3 sides of the same length. What type of triangle only has 2 sides of equal length. Equalateral

H3.text: An equilateral triangle has all 3 sides of the same length. What type of triangle only has 2 sides of equal length. Isoceles

A4.text: An isosceles triangle is a triangle that has two sides of equal length and two angles of equal measure.

A5.text: The two equal sides are called the legs and the third side is called the base.
